design_system_profile.name: Lumina_SaaS_Enterprise
design_system_profile.description: A refined, high-trust visual language designed for B2B SaaS and enterprise platforms. It merges clean Swiss-style typography with soft, modern 'glassmorphism' and ethereal gradient backdrops to communicate precision, security, and ease of use.

visual_foundation.theme_mode: Light (default) with high-contrast Dark Mode support

aesthetic_signature.gradients: Soft, blurred radial gradients (Aurora Borealis effect) in background layers.
aesthetic_signature.glassmorphism: Translucent UI elements with backdrop blur (blur-md to blur-xl) and subtle white borders.
aesthetic_signature.geometry: Generous border-radius (12px to 32px) creating a friendly yet professional feel.

primary.role: Brand anchor, primary actions, deep contrast headers

accent.role: Interactive elements, icons, data visualization, hero gradients

typography.font_family: Plus Jakarta Sans, Inter, or similar geometric sans-serif

grid_columns.features: Repeat(4, 1fr) on desktop, Repeat(2, 1fr) on tablet, 1fr on mobile

badges.style: Soft background (bg-opacity-10) with matching text color

icons.wrapper: Square container with rounded corners (rounded-xl), soft colored background

gradients.background_glow: Radial blobs (blue/indigo/purple) with high blur (blur-3xl) and low opacity

pattern_library.hero_layout: Center aligned text -> Call to Action buttons -> Large centralized visual dashboard preview.
pattern_library.dashboard_preview: Window-like container with traffic-light dots, sidebar navigation simulation, and data tables.
pattern_library.workflow_steps: Horizontal alignment with connecting lines or sequential numbering.
pattern_library.social_proof_bar: Grayscale logos, reduced opacity (60%), evenly spaced.
pattern_library.accordion_faq: Clean list, expand/collapse icon on right, smooth height transition.
